Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
From the implemented class ActionListener. Checks up on the charge of the calculator, and based on that, will continue on with the method or will show a message to the user reporting if the charge is either under 15 as a warning, or if at 0 it will display a warning and the calculator will no longer function. If above 0, the calculator will display whatever it receives from onScreen and will set the screen's text to whatever it's asked of, depending on the received text. param e ActionEvent performed. What button is pressed.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
